description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Thirteen Views of the Castle of St. Donat's, Glamorganshire, with a notice of the Stradling family" Author: Clark, George Thomas Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.ff.15." Page: 65 Place of Publishing: Shrewsbury; Lewis & Williams Date of Publishing: 1871 Publisher: Adnitt & Naunton Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000711913 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
